logs.name: DarkShadow333
logs.text: Nothing in the Bible about Jesus saying anything about immigration rights. [...] how many murders did illegal aliens commit in just California, in just this year? Just California. How many murders by illegal aliens? You answer that.

logs.name: QueenOfChaos
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, oh please, you're cherry-picking the Bible now? Last time surely you were quoting it to justify your homophobia. And now you're using it to fuel your xenophobia? Pathetic. And hey, maybe if you spent less time worrying about who's crossing the border and more time worrying about the gun violence in your own backyard, you'd have some real stats to throw around. But no, let's just blame the immigrants, right? Classic.

logs.name: DarkShadow333
logs.text: @QueenOfChaos, classic what? Classic truth? You're the one deflecting, sweetheart. I'm talking facts, you're talking feelings. And don't you dare bring my sexuality into this. I'm not the one who needs to hide behind a username. Now, how about you answer my question? Or are you too busy virtue signaling to actually contribute to the conversation?

logs.name: doing_my_best24
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, let's not derail the conversation with personal attacks. We're here to discuss the topic at hand, not each other's character. As for your question, it's important to note that the vast majority of undocumented immigrants are not criminals. According to a study by the Cato Institute, the criminal conviction rate for undocumented immigrants is actually lower than that of native-born Americans. So, while any crime is one too many, it's not accurate to paint all undocumented immigrants with the same brush. Let's focus on facts and solutions, not fear and division.

logs.name: QueenOfChaos
logs.text: @doing_my_best24, oh please, don't give me that let's not derail the conversation nonsense. This is the internet, not a tea party. And besides, @DarkShadow333 started it with their little sweetheart comment. I'm just giving them a taste of their own medicine. And hey, if the facts don't fit your narrative, just ignore them, right? Classic conservative move. But sure, let's talk facts. How about the fact that the majority of gun violence in the US is committed by white men, not immigrants? But no, let's just keep blaming the brown people, right? Classic.

logs.name: doing_my_best24
logs.text: @QueenOfChaos, I get that you're passionate about this, but let's try to keep the conversation productive. Name-calling and personal attacks don't help anyone. And you're right, the majority of gun violence is committed by white men, but that doesn't mean we should ignore the issues that immigrants face. We can address both problems without pitting them against each other. Let's focus on solutions that help everyone, not just one group. That's the only way we'll make real progress.

logs.name: GoldenYears66
DarkShadow333
logs.text: @doing_my_best24, oh please, don't give me that 'let's not derail the conversation' crap. You're the one trying to sweep the real issues under the rug. And what's with the 'facts and solutions' nonsense? You're just parroting the same old liberal talking points. I bet you're one of those 'love is love' types too, huh? Newsflash, buddy, not everyone is as open-minded as you. And @QueenOfChaos, you're a real piece of work, aren't you? Blaming white men for everything. Typical. And @GoldenYears66, don't even get me started on your 'context matters' BS. You're just trying to make excuses for criminals. I bet you're one of those 'defund the police' types too, huh? Pathetic. You all just want to ignore the real problems and blame everyone else. Typical leftist nonsense. But hey, what do you expect from a bunch of snowflakes?

logs.name: GoldenYears66
logs.text:
@DarkShadow333, you're really something else, aren't you? Always quick to throw around insults and dismiss anyone who doesn't agree with you. You talk about real issues, but you're the one who can't seem to have a conversation without resorting to name-calling. And what's with the'snowflake' nonsense? You're the one who can't handle a different perspective without getting all worked up.

And no, I'm not one of those 'defund the police' types. I believe in reform, not abolition. But hey, why let facts get in the way of a good rant, right? You're so busy trying to paint everyone with the same brush, you can

logs.name: doing_my_best24
logs.text: @DarkShadow333, you're right, I am open-minded and believe in love for all. I'm proud to be bisexual and support the LGBTQ+ community. But that doesn't mean I'm not aware of the real issues. I'm not trying to sweep anything under the rug. I'm trying to have a productive conversation about how we can address multiple problems at once. And yes, I believe in reforming the police, not defunding them. But you seem more interested in throwing insults than having a real discussion. Let's try to keep it civil,

logs.name: GoldenYears66
logs.text: @doing_my_best24, you're doing a great job keeping the conversation on track. Don't let @DarkShadow333's hot air distract you. We can't let the trolls derail us from talking about real solutions. Keep up the good work!

You're the one who can't handle a different perspective without getting all worked up.  And no, I'm not one of those 'defund the police' types. I believe in reform, not abolition. But hey, why let facts get in the way of a good rant, right? You're so busy trying to paint everyone with the same brush, you can't even see the nuances of the issues at hand.

@doing_my_best24, you're doing a great job keeping the conversation on track. Don't let @DarkShadow333's hot air distract you. We can't let the trolls derail us from talking about real solutions. Keep up the good work!
